scripts.build: pug src/components/meet/MeetTemplate.pug -c -n MeetPageTemplate & pug src/components/cards/MetCard/MetCardTemplate.pug -c -n MetCardTemplate & pug src/components/cards/UserCard/UserCardTemplate.pug -c -n UserCardTemplate & pug src/components/profile/ProfileTemplate.pug -c -n ProfilePageTemplate
scripts.clear: rm src/components/meet/MeetTemplate.js & rm src/components/cards/MetCard/MetCardTemplate.js & rm src/components/cards/UserCard/UserCardTemplate.js & rm src/components/profile/ProfileTemplate.js
